key_linting_rules: import/order: error (external, builtin, internal, sibling, parent, index)

readability.notes: Code reads like well-written prose with clear intent at every level

adherence_summary.DRY: Strong - Shared utilities, single source of truth for schemas
adherence_summary.KISS: Strong - Functions avg 20-30 lines, clear single purposes
adherence_summary.YAGNI: Strong - Focused feature set, no speculative code
adherence_summary.Single_Responsibility: Strong - Each module has clear purpose
adherence_summary.Open_Closed: Moderate - Format and Storage interfaces allow extensions
adherence_summary.WET: Not Observed - No significant code duplication
adherence_summary.AHA: Moderate - Abstractions created when patterns emerged

coding_style.consistency_assessment: High consistency across all modules. ESLint rules strictly followed. TypeScript strict mode enabled. No style violations detected.

testing.test_structure: describe/it blocks with clear test names
testing.test_utilities: test/support/ for shared test helpers and fixtures

recommendations: Continue maintaining current practices - excellent code quality
Keep functions small (< 40 lines) - current avg of 20-30 is ideal
Continue using Result type pattern for explicit error handling
Optional: Consider extracting complex switch cases in backfill.ts for easier testing
